title: Science Inquiry Leadership Program Utilizing Complex Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and mobile device usage skills
context.additional_context: Environment aimed at strengthening science-based decision-making competencies as managers, performing 10-minute learning modules via mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific problems by applying the three-stage discovery learning process (problem definition → hypothesis verification → conclusion derivation)
Learners achieve over 80% learning effectiveness at each stage through intermediate knowledge state assessments
Learners can compare the effectiveness of explanatory teaching methods before/after problem-solving in blended instructional design environments and select optimal learning strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
